Had the pleasure to work on the 1080p of this. its one of the best cam quality wise but its kind of zoomed in... uper side is usually the victim of zoom often you will see half heads so read this here first before you rely on some noob ratings..
no point of rotation or perspective fixed since the video is already zoomed in so whats the point of losing more picture.
did crop, resize, smart bright, contrast, rgb, colors and then synced our digital audio to finish encode. all went good! i have added 2 video samples check them, both are enough to judge the entire quality. no movements stable to the end.. Enjoy....
